body_html: It looks like disabling GCP causes an error when trying to use a package in tensorflow/contrib, as the init file automatically imports cloud regardless of whether the user opted to disable it (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/__init__.py#L30). Do you have any suggestions as to how we could fix this?
